snippet: BOESCHENSTEIN--Josephine "Molly." Freedom Institute extends its sympathy to the family of Josephine "Molly" Boeschenstein, a former Board Member and wonderful friend. Her support of our work in the prevention and treatment of alcohol and substance abuse and addiction was unwavering. Molly's generosity and commitment to our cause leaves a lasting legacy. With gratitude, Freedom Institute. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BOESCHENSTEIN--Josephine "Molly." Freedom Institute extends its sympathy to the family of Josephine "Molly" Boeschenstein, a former Board Member and wonderful friend. Her support of our work in the prevention and treatment of alcohol and substance abuse and addiction was unwavering. Molly's generosity and commitment to our cause leaves a lasting legacy. With gratitude, Freedom Institute. 1/3
